Posts.EditableText: Could you add the option to make an object have multiple parents? This could be helpful if the writer wanted the same, say, sky in two [three, four, etc.] different rooms (like the garden and the front lawn), or the ground in a mall. Thanks. If this is already able to be done, I'm sorry I didn't notice.
